definitions.description: Entity for waste generated in operations, including disposal and treatment of waste generated.

constantValues: Entity for waste generated in operations, including disposal and treatment of waste generated.

members.name: wastegeneratedinoperationsId
members.description: Unique identifier for entity instances

members.name: TTLInSeconds
members.description: Time to live in seconds.

members.name: partitionId
members.description: Logical partition id. A logical partition consists of a set of records with same partition id.

constantValues: Logical partition id. A logical partition consists of a set of records with same partition id.

members.name: createdOn
members.description: Date and time when the record was created.

constantValues: Date and time when the record was created.

members.name: modifiedOn
members.description: Date and time when the record was modified.

constantValues: Date and time when the record was modified.

members.name: importSequenceNumber
members.description: Sequence number of the import that created this record.

constantValues: Sequence number of the import that created this record.

members.name: overriddenCreatedOn
members.description: Date and time that the record was migrated.

constantValues: Date and time that the record was migrated.

members.name: name
members.description: The name of the custom entity.

constantValues: The name of the custom entity.

members.name: consumptionenddate
members.description: End date of activity consumption.

members.name: accountid
members.description: Comprehensive information about a supplier, customer, third-party manufacturer, or investee.

constantValues: Comprehensive information about a supplier, customer, third-party manufacturer, or investee.

members.name: consumptionstartdate
members.description: Start date of activity consumption.

members.name: cost
members.description: Cost associated with activity data.

members.name: costunit
members.description: Unit associated with the cost quantity.

constantValues: Unit associated with the cost quantity.

members.name: customdimension
members.description: Field where Custom Dimension values are stored in JSON format.

constantValues: Field where Custom Dimension values are stored in JSON format.

members.name: dataqualitytype
members.description: Description of the data quality that identifies if the data is actual, estimated, or other descriptors of the data.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

supportingAttribute.name: dataqualitytype_display

constantValues: Description of the data quality that identifies if the data is actual, estimated, or other descriptors of the data.

members.name: description
members.description: Optional description to give additional detail to the entity or attribute.

constantValues: Optional description to give additional detail to the entity or attribute.

members.name: disposalmethodid
members.description: Method of waste disposal, such as compost or recycle.

constantValues: Method of waste disposal, such as compost or recycle.

members.name: distance
members.description: Quantity associated with distance activity which contributes to mobile combustion or supply chain travel.

constantValues: Quantity associated with distance activity which contributes to mobile combustion or supply chain travel.

members.name: distanceunit
members.description: Unique identifier for the unit associated with distance.

constantValues: Unique identifier for the unit associated with distance.

members.name: evidence
members.description: Optional field where evidence can be linked to an entity or attribute, if required.

constantValues: Optional field where evidence can be linked to an entity or attribute, if required.

members.name: facilityid
members.description: Unique identifier for Facility associated with waste generated in operations.

constantValues: Unique identifier for Facility associated with waste generated in operations.

constantValues: Unique identifier of the fuel consumption data associated with combustion or supply chain fuel usage.

members.name: fuelquantityunit
members.description: Unique identifier of the unit associated with fuel data.

constantValues: Unique identifier of the unit associated with fuel data.

members.description: Unique identifier of the fuel type associated with combustion or supply chain fuel usage.

constantValues: Unique identifier of the fuel type associated with combustion or supply chain fuel usage.

members.name: industrialprocesstypeid
members.description: Type of industrial process used to track and associate with activity data.

members.name: materialid
members.description: Material of waste, such as aluminum.

members.name: product

members.name: productidentifier
members.description: A unique alphanumeric code or number assigned to a specific product for the purpose of identification, tracking, and inventory management.
